short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto market analysis made easy. Overview, alert, quotes all in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you invest in crypto currency, you need 3 things.

Data. Trend. Mindfulness.

Even though the main point in crypto investing is catching the big wave,

You should calm yourself down with self confidence.

This Chrome extension will make it happen.

- You can get the market data in browser
- You can setup the price alert
- You can check all important news
- You can access to the analytics charts
- You can enjoy the nice quotes about investing

New tab opens with new layout including crypt fundamental data and search bar (Bing) etc.

Disclaimer : We are not advising how to invest. Instead we provide the useful data in the best user interface so that you can organize your brain nicely. Regarding the investment itself, the risk is yours.

Note : The search window is powered by Microsoft Bing
